The complexity of this view is considered medium due to the following factors:
It involves a single outer join with another table, which adds some complexity but is not overly intricate.
The view includes multiple data transformations, such as type conversions and concatenations, which require careful handling to ensure data integrity.

: This view is used to generate reports or dashboards that provide insights into manual billing activities for accounts. It can be used by finance teams to track billing status and by operations to monitor energy usage.
Generating invoices or billing summaries for manual billing accounts.
Analyzing energy consumption and billing trends over time.
Auditing and reconciliation of manual billing entries.
